嘉日: (かじつ) - auspicious day; good day; lucky day; beautiful day
嘉留太: (カルタ) - karuta (por: carta); traditional Japanese playing cards
嘉肴: (かこう) - delicacy; rare treat; good-eating fish
嘉言善行: (かげんぜんこう) - good words and good deeds
嘉辰: (かしん) - lucky day; auspicious occasion; happy day
嘔: (おう) - Vômito, ficar enjoado, ficar com raiva
嘔き気: (はきけ) - nausea; sickness in the stomach
嘔吐く: (えづく) - to vomit; to throw up; to feel nauseated; to feel sick
嘔吐中枢: (おうとちゅうすう) - vomiting center; area postrema; part of the brain that controls vomiting
嘔吐反射: (おうとはんしゃ) - vomiting reflex; retching reflex
嘔吐物: (おうとぶつ) - vomit; vomitus; vomited matter
嘖む: (さいなむ) - to torment; to torture; to harass
嘗て: (かつて) - once/before/formerly/ever/former/ex-; (used with neg. verb) never yet/never before/first time/still not happened
嘗め: (なめ) - lick; tasting medicine to see if it contains poison/medicine-taster
嘗める: (なめる) - to lick; to taste; to experience (esp. a hardship); to make fun of/to make light of/to put down/to treat with contempt/to underestimate
嘗糞: (しょうふん) - shamelessly flattering; brown-nosing; licking excrement
嘘: (きょ) - Mentira, mentir, falsidade, inverdade; engano, erro; jogada imprudente, decisão ruim; de jeito nenhum!, inacreditável!, sério?!
嘘から出た誠: (うそからでたまこと) - Truth comes out of falsehood
嘘っこ: (うそっこ) - (doing something) for fun; not for keeps
嘘っ八百: (うそっぱっぴゃく) - full of lies
嘘つき: (うそつき) - liar (sometimes said with not much seriousness); fibber
嘘つきは泥棒のはじまり: (うそつきはどろぼうのはじまり) - Show me a liar, and I will show you a thief
嘘つきは泥棒の始まり: (うそつきはどろぼうのはじまり) - Show me a liar, and I will show you a thief
嘘でかためる: (うそでかためる) - to fabricate a web of lies
嘘で固める: (うそでかためる) - to fabricate a web of lies
嘘と坊主の頭はゆったことがない: (うそとぼうずのあたまはゆったことがない) - (joc) (play on 言う and 結う)  having never told a lie
嘘のよう: (うそのよう) - hard to believe; fabulous; unbelievable; incredible
嘘の皮: (うそのかわ) - total lie; big lie; complete lie
嘘ぶく: (うそぶく) - to boast/to brag; to recite (a song or poem to oneself); to bark/to roar/to howl
嘘も方便: (うそもほうべん) - the end justifies the means; circumstances may justify a lie
嘘をつく: (うそをつく) - to tell a lie; to fib
嘘を付く: (うそをつく) - to tell a lie; to fib
嘘を吐く: (うそをつく) - to tell a lie; to fib
嘘付き: (うそつき) - liar (sometimes said with not much seriousness); fibber
嘘偽り: (うそいつわり) - great lie; lie; falsehood
嘘八百: (うそはっぴゃく) - full of lies
嘘吐き: (うそつき) - liar (sometimes said with not much seriousness); fibber
嘘吐きは泥棒の始まり: (うそつきはどろぼうのはじまり) - Show me a liar, and I will show you a thief
嘘泣き: (うそなき) - faking crying; crocodile tears
嘯く: (うそぶく) - to boast/to brag; to recite (a song or poem to oneself); to bark/to roar/to howl
嘱する: (ぞくする) - to entrust; (しょくする only) to send (a message, etc.)
嘱望: (shokubou) - (ter grande) expectativa, depositar suas esperanças em
嘱目: (しょくもく) - paying attention to; catching one's eye
嘱託: (shokutaku) - comissão, encarregando de (trabalho); funcionário meio período, trabalho temporário
嘱託殺人: (しょくたくさつじん) - contract murder
嘲ける: (あざける) - to scoff; to laugh at; to make fun of; to ridicule; to jeer at
嘲り笑う: (あざけりわらう) - to laugh to scorn
嘲る: (azakeru) - zombar, rir de, fazer piada de, ridicularizar, caçoar de
嘲笑い: (せせらわらい) - sardonic laugh; scornful smile
嘲笑う: (せせらわらう) - to sneer at; to ridicule
嘴が黄色い: (くちばしがきいろい) - fledgling; young and inexperienced; green; wet behind the ears
嘴をはさむ: (くちばしをはさむ) - to stick one's nose into (someone else's business); to meddle; to interfere; to butt in
嘴を挟む: (くちばしをさしはさむ) - to stick one's nose into (someone else's business); to meddle; to interfere; to butt in
嘴太ペンギン: (ハシブトペンギン) - Snares penguin (Eudyptes robustus); Snares crested penguin; Snares Islands penguin
嘴太機織: (ハシブトハタオリ) - grosbeak weaver (Amblyospiza albifrons)
嘴太海烏: (ハシブトウミガラス) - thick-billed murre (Uria lomvia); Brunnich's guillemot
嘴太鴉: (ハシブトガラス) - jungle crow (Corvus macrorhynchos)
嘴広鴨: (ハシビロガモ) - northern shoveler (species of duck, Anas clypeata); northern shoveller
嘴曲千鳥: (ハシマガリチドリ) - wrybill (Anarhynchus frontalis)
嘴細啄木鳥: (ハシボソキツツキ) - northern flicker (species of bird, incl. the yellow-shafted flicker and the red-shafted flicker, Colaptes auratus)
嘴細鴉: (はしぼそがらす) - carrion crow (Corvus corone)
嘴長土竜: (ハシナガモグラ) - long-nosed mole (Euroscaptor longirostris)
嘴長海豚: (ハシナガイルカ) - spinner dolphin (Stenella longirostris)
嘴黒阿比: (ハシグロアビ) - common loon (Gavia immer); great northern diver; great northern loon
嘴黒鶲: (ハシグロヒタキ) - northern wheatear (Oenanthe oenanthe)
